document_data.name: House Jegg'Dralnoc
document_data.mainbody: '''House Jegg'Dralnoc''' was a [[Lolthite]] [[drow]] house of the city of [[Sschindylryn]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-time}}
document_data.History: By the time of the [[Darkening]] in the mid-1480s DR, Jegg'Dralnoc was near-extinct. The house had been almost destroyed by [[House Szind]] during a power struggle, and its members only survived hidden in the dark corners of the world.
document_data.Members:
During the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR, the house was much reduced in number:
* [[Asta Jegg'Dralnoc]], a [[Chosen of Lolth]].
* [[Galfriel Jegg'Dralnoc]], the last priestess of the house.
